usage: %MAIN% server [start|stop|status|list|getData|setData] [options...]
usage: %MAIN% server [getClusterData|setClusterData|listClusterData] [options...]


Server options are:

    --host=name
        Required. The host name of the target Collective Controller.

    --port=num
        Required. The HTTPS port number of the target Collective Controller.

    --user=name
        Required. An Administrator user for the target Collective Controller.

    --password=pwd
        Required. The password for the Administrator user for the target
        Collective Controller.

    --autoAcceptCertificates
        Optional. Automatically trust SSL certificates during this command.

    --hostName
        Required only for start/stop/status. Specify the hostName used for
        a particular server.

    --wlpnUserDir
        Required only for start/stop/status. Specify the user directory used for
        a particular server.

    --serverName
        Required only for start/stop/status. Specify the server name used for
        a particular server.

    --path
        Required only for getData/setData. Specify path in the controller's
        registry that holds the data.

    --data
        Required only for setData. Specify the data (key-value pair) which is
        being set in the controller's registry.

Cluster options:
    --clusterName
        Required for all cluster commands. Name of cluster to get/set data.

    --key
        Required for getClusterEnv and setClusterEnv. Name of key to store
        data on controller.

    --data
        Required for setClusterEnv. Data to store on controller.
